extendedInfo.description: ** Notice: Word Game 2 now available!Make words from a pile of 7 random letters against the clock for high score. Many game play twists make this highly addictive and unique.Will appeal to Scrabble players to crossword solvers. Uses professional tournament word lists (CSW12 / TWL06), US and UK spellings.** Free (limited) version available.** News, FAQ and Hi Scores at:** http://funqai.com/and_wordgame.htmlFAQThere's nothing to do when no words exist.Firstly you should try to avoid a situation where no words are available by looking ahead at what letters are coming next and planning accordingly. If that fails the 'X' buttons below the letter will swap out that letter for the next one.These words arn't really words / A common word is not included.There are a great many words in use in the english language and I cannot hope to please everyone as to their definition of what is a word or not. The 2 dictionaries offered to use are official word lists used in tournament Scrabble. I think if anyone knows whether a word should be in or out of a game like this then it's these guys.

reviews.title: One of my favorites
reviews.comment: I still play this from time to time even though it was one of the first games I downloaded and paid for. Then I rooted, now I don\'t pay for sh*t...(Ha ha, free stuff is better)  But if I had too, I\'d throw a buck down on this game.
reviews.author: Benjamin L.

reviews.title: So much fun!
reviews.comment: Especially when the timer is running out!
reviews.author: RDavis CCP

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Actually my first in store purchase... Love it.... Downloaded for my mom Add more background themes
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome !
reviews.comment: I am pretty much addicted to this game !

reviews.title: Addict
reviews.comment: I play this this and zone out and only play this game I love it

reviews.title: Superb!
reviews.comment: This game is so addictive! Well worth paying for the pro version.

reviews.title: Highly recommended
reviews.comment: A brilliant game, I have been playing the free version but was limited to 100 words,  so just had to upgrade to full version.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Addictive!
reviews.comment: Great word game. Easy to hit letters! Keeps your interest for a long time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Addictive fast-paced game.Lots a fun.
reviews.comment: Great game. I keep trying to outdo my best score. I could play this for hours.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Has potential.
reviews.comment: Please add an option to automatically alphabetize the rack, and maybe in practice mode allow the user to stay on the same rack and try to find all possible words, or at least find all possible bingos.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: New version (1.61) responds much better than the last version, which was much slower than the free version. HTC Desire, Android 2.3.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Fun to play. Even kids love it. Addictive
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: word game
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great fun very addictive
reviews.comment: Now have the highest score, took over two months. Wish game had option to end game AND save the high score. Had the high score before but it didn\'t save because I ended the game. Had to let time run out and took over 16 hours! Also need a hidden word list somewhere online so I can know what else to look for and an explanation of the new bonuses. Game is a lot of fun and highly addictive!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: addictive n fun, won\'t allow sum words - asia, asian, zen.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love to play but I can\'t see the global scores to compare with others.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good time killer. Full version has unlimited words and practice mode (no clock). Would like to have hints and see longest words.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Sloppy, inelegant UI. Needs drastic cosmetic overhaul...and color themes.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Pro is the same as free. I like the game but time should stop when no words available. Needs other levels maybe.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good word game with the biggest dictionary! Not suitable if you panic when playing against the clock.
